title: Easy Fish Tacos
lede: Fish tacos can be filled with either fried fish (not healthy!) or grilled fish (healthy!). Here’s the healthy version, with a citrus marinade and tangy cabbage slaw.

title: Easy Slow Cooker Pulled Pork
lede: The whole point of using a slow cooker is to get the ingredients into the cooker quickly and then be able to walk away.

title: Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream
lede: After getting my hands on some of Biscoff’s spiced cookie spread, I wasn’t sure what to do with it, because it tasted like graham crackers but was smooth like peanut butter.

title: Paprika Grilled Salmon with Lemon Aioli
lede: Fresh salmon fillets marinate briefly in olive oil and paprika before meeting a hot grill pan in this simple recipe. A classic aioli (garlic mayonnaise) punched up with lemon and Dijon mustard is the perfect accompaniment.

title: Slow Cooker Pork Ramen
lede: The finest Japanese pork ramen takes considerable culinary skill and many hours to create. Here is a simplified, yet still delicious, version that boasts plenty of succulent braised pork.

title: Chocolate Mint Brownies
lede: For this classic chocolate mint brownies recipes, chocolate-covered peppermint patties candies are baked into a rich brownie batter.

title: Grilled Shishito Peppers
lede: This grilled shishito peppers recipe is sprinkled with togarashi for an extra kick of spice.

title: Ice Cream Cupcakes with Chocolate Cake and Cookies and Cream Ice Cream
lede: Kids and other sweets junkies will love these these rich chocolate ice cream cupcakes: chocolate cake topped with cookies and cream ice cream, whipped cream, and an Oreo cookie.
